sections.heading: Disposal of unclaimed garments
sections.text:
Any garment left with a retail dry cleaner or retail launderer for dry cleaning or laundering which is not redeemed within 1 year may be disposed of by the dry cleaner or launderer without any liability or responsibility for the garment or any proceeds realized therefr
§

 4101;50 Del. Laws, c. 330,

§

 1;
